ygData.subject: RE: So anyone wanna trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: i tihnk you need at least 7 to 12 more levels before you go after your own drum. here is my take on your trade...  bad idea. mm drums go for 500 to 1000pp.  a
ygData.messageBody:
i tihnk you need at least 7 to 12 more levels before you go after your own
drum.

here is my take on your trade... bad idea.

mm drums go for 500 to 1000pp. a paw of opalla goes for 10000pp. yes 10k.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, L24 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L20 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> What is the consensus? Is this a fair trade? Be it known
> that I've camped
> Paw pieces for approximately 25 hours and had to get my
> baking skill up as
> well (and we bards are the brightest bunch). At 28th I think that I'm
> approaching the level that I would expect to be able to get a
> MM Battle Drum
> with my own group. Is this correct?
>
> Crier Sharpsong
